DOC.brief_summary: This 6 month study will assess an investigational medication for patients on dialysis with secondary hyperparathyroidism. The study will look at the effects on parathyroid hormone, calcium and phosphorus levels.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of an Investigational Medication for the Treatment of Secondary Hyperparathyroidism in Patients on Dialysis
DOC.criteria: Patients must be receiving hemodialysis; have elevated parathyroid hormone levels; not be pregnant or nursing; and not have had a heart attack in the last 3 months.
